topic.title: The Create eXist-db XML connection Dialog

body.p: A quick way to create an eXist connection is to use the dedicated Create eXist-db XML connection dialog. Go to Options Preferences Data Sources and click Create eXist-db XML connection. After you fill in the fields in this dialog, click OK and go to Window Show View Data Source Explorer to view your connection.
To create an eXist connection using this dialog, expects the exist/webstart/exist.jnlp path to be accessible at the Host and Port provided.
